cms.query.QueryText: SELECT DISTINCT CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryID, CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryDisplayName, CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryParentID, CMS_PageTemplateSite.SiteID FROM CMS_PageTemplate INNER JOIN CMS_PageTemplateCategory ON CMS_PageTemplate.PageTemplateCategoryID = CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryID INNER JOIN CMS_PageTemplateSite ON CMS_PageTemplate.PageTemplateID = CMS_PageTemplateSite.PageTemplateID WHERE (CMS_PageTemplateSite.SiteID = @SiteId) AND (CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryDisplayName <> 'ad-hoc') ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
